answers.answer: Yes you can suffer from both pcos and endo. I suggest, since your Mom had endo...you might want to get checked out by a doctor to see if you have endo. Are you being treated for your pcos? Most of us take either metformin or birth control, or sometimes both medications to control pcos.

question: I have been diagnosed with PCOS and have diabetes.....before and during my period i cramp and bleed so bad it seems absoultely unbearable.  I cry in pain, and even here lately have started to get pressure and hurt in my butt when i have my period.  My mom was diagnosed with endimetriosis when she was 23 and had a complete hysterectomy.....im beginning to wonder if im not having  other things going on besides my PCOS....does the two tie in together???? could i suffer from both....???
title: Does anyone suffer like me?
